item.title: Fire halts Euston rail services to several cities across the UK
item.description: There is major disruption on all rail services between Euston station and Watford Junction.

item.title: Former CNN host Don Lemon arrested after anti-ICE protests at Minnesota church
item.description: Lemon says he was just doing his job as a journalist reporting on the protests at the church.

item.title: Luigi Mangione will not face death penalty if convicted, judge rules
item.description: The judge dismissed a federal murder charge against the 27 year old.

item.title: Djokovic & Alcaraz win five-set epics to reach Australian Open final
item.description: Novak Djokovic will meet Carlos Alcaraz in the Australian Open final after both players maintain their respective bids for history by coming through f...
